name: Cotidia
description: We’re a digital application partner to better, faster, smarter businesses. We design and build bespoke web and mobile solutions that allow clients to serve their customers better, provide seamless experiences across multiple devices and save businesses time and reduce costs. We’re proudly based in the heart of Birmingham. We work with the best local talent and visit clients all over the country - even Internationally in person.

locations.address: The Big Peg Studio 211F 120 Vyse Street
